line.text: Mine eye hath played the painter and hath stelled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy beauty form in table of my heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My body is the frame wherein tis held
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And perspective it is best painter art
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For through the painter must you see his skill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To find where your true image pictured lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which in my bosom shop is hanging still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That hath his windows glazed with thine eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Now see what good turns eyes for eyes have done
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine eyes have drawn thy shape and thine for me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Are windows to my breast where-through the sun
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Delights to peep to gaze therein on thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet eyes this cunning want to grace their art
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They draw but what they see know not the heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
